description.description1: Indulge in our refreshing and energizing cold brew. Served chilled, with our without ice-cubes, this dark roast boasts a rich flavour of dark chocolate and caramel.
description.description2: •  50% washed, 50% natural beans from Nicaragua and Honduras.
description.description3: Our small can is convenient to keep in your fridge and take on the go. Also available in packs of 40 for events or office spaces.

description.description1:
Indulge in our classic House Blend – a perfect mix of natural and washed processed coffee, boasting notes of hazelnuts, liquorice and blood orange. Ideal for espresso, French press or the classic Italian stovetop, it’s the backbone of our coffee shops.

This is the timeless espresso blend which we serve in our shops, crafted from 100% organic arabica beans:

50% of the beans are washed
50% undergo natural processing.
This coffee is organic certified by bio-inspecta.
Indulge in our refreshing and energizing cold brew. Served chilled, with or without ice-cubes, this dark roast boasts a rich flavour of dark chocolate and caramel.
description.description2: 50% washed, 50% natural beans from Nicaragua and Honduras.
description.description3: Our small can is convenient to keep in your fridge and take on the go. Also available in packs of 40 for events or office spaces.
